#
# File generated by CMakeBuilder
#
#

#Add resources
SET( RESOURCES Textures.7z Shaders/bump.vert Shaders/bump.frag )

#Create executable
IF( APPLE )
	MESSAGE( "Setting application bundle resources to ${RESOURCES}" )
	SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES( Textures.7z PROPERTIES MACOSX_PACKAGE_LOCATION Resources )
	SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES( Shaders/bump.vert Shaders/bump.frag PROPERTIES MACOSX_PACKAGE_LOCATION Resources/Shaders )
	ADD_EXECUTABLE ( BumpMapping MACOSX_BUNDLE main.cpp ${RESOURCES} )
ELSE( NOT APPLE)

	ADD_EXECUTABLE ( BumpMapping main.cpp )

ENDIF( APPLE )
#ADD_DEPENDENCIES (BumpMapping Core)

IF(NOT BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
MESSAGE("Additional dependencies linkage of BumpMapping")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(BumpMapping  ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${STLPORT_LIBRARIES} ${SDL_LIBRARY} ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${COREFOUNDATION})
ENDIF(NOT BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(BumpMapping FreyaCore)
